Text: while i applaud the DIY energy generator stuff, photo voltaics are undergoing a big [and positive] overhaul. people working in the field have found that green colored glass with much smaller and less expensive silicon strips just along the edges will generate more power more efficiently than current designs. it's a case of people FINALLY looking to nature for efficient design. just about anything that converts energy from the sun is what color? yeah.
